item.title: Making commands on the quest tab. I need help please
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

Ok so I have this code } if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("jad")){ teleportToX = 3086; teleportToY = 3933; sendMessage("Walk down the arena if you dare! (Teaming is a good idea)");

I wanted to add that so when you click on Jad on the quest tabs it teles you there. So this is what I did. I wanted to make the quest id 7346. When you click on that quest id on the quest tab I wanted to make it so it teled you to Jad. So I did this: sendQuest("Jad", 7346);

Then I made this: case 7346: if (teleblock == true) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); } else { customCommand("jad"); } break;

It all compiles right but it doesn’t work when you click on it. How do I fix it? Is everything I’m doing correct?

Read full topic
item.source: Making commands on the quest tab. I need help please
